activities.name: Copy data from OnPremise SQL to Azure SQL
Copy data from SQL DB to Storage Blob
Iterate through the Sheets in the Workbook
Copy data from Local FileSystem to Azure SQL DB
Copy data to department wise tables
Copy data to department wise tables_copy1
Copy data from OnPremise SQL to Azure SQL
Copy data from SQL Server to ADLS Gen2

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string (Color)
}
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(Color=='Black',
	Color=='Blue',
	Color=='Grey',
	Color=='Red',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(black, blue, grey, red, others)
ConditionalSplit1@black sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> blacksink
ConditionalSplit1@blue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> bluesink
ConditionalSplit1@grey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> greysink
ConditionalSplit1@red sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> redsink
ConditionalSplit1@others sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> otherssink

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
SalesLTCustomer derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomer exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomer lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),currentTimestamp(),InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
